!ask | Tbruff13: how can i get ipod touch support in xubuntu 11.04
AIUI, the ipod touch is supported by most programs in the more recent releases: GTKpod and Banshee certainly are both supposed to be able to deal with it.
Have you tried GTKpod or Banshee?  Both of them at least /claim/ support, and gusg just supported Banshee.
